history.proof: intros. unfold ex_lim in *. destruct H as [l Hlim]. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_opp.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x, l : Rbar Hlim : is_lim f x l P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_opp ?M2374 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (- l) eps y -> P y".
In environment f : R -> R x, l : Rbar Hlim : is_lim f x l Unable to unify "is_lim f x l" with "is_lim (fun y : R => - f y) x (- l)".

original: intros f x H. unfold ex_lim in *. destruct H as [l Hlim]. exists (- l). apply is_lim_opp. apply Hlim.
